attributes.additional_details: The general public are unaware that playing B2 Fixed odds betting machines (roulette machines) in high street betting offices are currently set to a 92% payout return in favour of the operator, I allege the operators claim the payout return is over 97% in line with the mathematics of the game, this is effectively misleading the public and causing social issues, while no regulation is in place to protect the public from this misleading information, that can be easily obtained from interrogation of the Fobt software, I ask you to sign this petition requesting the government investigate this inaccurate and misleading information.
